name: plainprince
aboutMe: Hi! I'm $name, a $age-year-old fullstack developer passionate about building creative solutions across the entire tech stack. From web applications to embedded systems, I love diving into diverse technologies and bringing ideas to life.

My work spans JavaScript and TypeScript for modern web development, Rust for systems programming, and C++ for performance-critical applications. I'm particularly interested in ESP32 and Arduino microcontrollers, where I combine software engineering with hardware to create interactive projects.

Beyond web and embedded development, I explore graphics programming (path tracing, rendering), game development, and developer tools. Whether it's building a simple image editor, creating a Minecraft launcher, or developing Blender addons, I enjoy tackling challenging problems and learning new technologies along the way.
You can find my projects on GitHub at github.com/$username, where I share everything from fullstack web apps to microcontroller projects. Always open to collaboration and new ideas!

skills.name: Rust
skills.desc: Systems programming, memory safety without garbage collection, zero-cost abstractions, and WebAssembly.

skills.name: C++
skills.desc: High-performance applications, system software, and embedded systems.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.desc: Advanced modern JavaScript (ES6+), async/await, closures, prototypes, and DOM manipulation.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.desc: Static typing, interfaces, generics, and strict mode configurations for robust codebases.

skills.name: Microcontrollers
skills.desc: Embedded C/C++, RTOS, hardware interfacing (I2C, SPI, UART), and circuit design basics.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.desc: Server-side runtime, Express.js API development, file system operations, and streams.

skills.name: SQL
skills.desc: Relational database design, complex queries, joins, transactions, and PostgreSQL/MySQL optimization.

skills.name: Git
skills.desc: Version control workflows, branching strategies, rebasing, and CI/CD integration.
